name: ChivvyUploadDataTransform
description: This is a template jsdom component. It shows how to use most of the functionality available in a js dom component.

input.name: data
input.description: Takes in the mapped  event data from the excel spreadsheet.

output.name: badData
output.description: Bad data returned from the request.

output.name: goodData
output.description: Good data returned from the request.

output.name: hasError
output.description: Indicates if some of the data came back with an error.

output.name: transformedData
output.description: An output that returns the transformed data
